definition: with firmness and conviction, characterized by firm and unwavering conviction, (geometry) a plane rectangle with four equal sides and four right angles
details:
adverb
- with firmness and conviction
= synonyms: squarely
- in a square position
= example: in a square position
adjective
- characterized by firm and unwavering conviction
= example: characterized by firm and unwavering conviction
noun
- (geometry) a plane rectangle with four equal sides and four right angles
= synonyms: square
